entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:11 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
